page.title: 07Traffic Survey
page.content: To do this survey we watched on Frithville Road and Sibsey Main Road. We looked at traffic in both directions for 1 hour at each place. It was mid-afternoon on a Thursday. {Aim of survey {1.}To see the different types of vehicle using the roads. {2.}To see if more traffic uses SIBSEY ROAD or FRITHVILLE ROAD. ************************************** * Vehicle * Sibsey * Frithville * ************************************** {* lorries * 26 * 5 * * tractors * 2 * 3 * {* mo bikes * 3 * 5 * * cars * 145 * 62 * {* buses * 3 * 1 * * bicycles * 2 * 0 * {* vans * 22 * 12 * **************************************
